dmca.title: [ABUSE] pirate copies of OUR software on one your Servers]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 10, 2005 8:55 AM
To: hackbart@dvbviewer.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] pirate copies of OUR software on one your Servers]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] pirate copies of OUR software on one your Servers
Date: Tue, 10 May 2005 15:00:19 +0200
From: Christian Hackbart <hackbart@dvbviewer.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Dear Sir,

unluckily we found a couple of illegal software on one of your servers:
The following files are pirate copies of our product:

http://www.skystar.ws/files/DVBViewerAutoSetup.part1.rar
http://www.skystar.ws/files/DVBViewerAutoSetup.part2.rar
http://www.skystar.ws/files/DVBViewerAutoSetup.part3.rar
http://www.skystar.ws/files/DVBViewerAutoSetup.part4.rar
http://www.skystar.ws/files/DVBViewerAutoS...10305Update.rar

We are looking forward, hearing from you

Sincerly
Christian Hackbart



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCgL0uvK/XpJs6oyURAnx8AJ9T14gVicnac9xoEpzQ6BkGSyq5OACgqb5k
Mj0kgHI2sAj1D+6OZTzfwfE=
=J5Vi
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
